theme-grays.name: mute
theme-grays.comment: Used for some disabled states; also called $disabled-color

theme-grays.name: darker
theme-grays.comment: Used as background in TOC widget for special issue and Journal landing page for TOC widget box

additional-colors.name: primary-hover
additional-colors.comment: Used as the hover state for $primary

additional-colors.name: dark-gray01
additional-colors.comment: Used as hover state for $darker-gray text

additional-colors.name: gray-400
additional-colors.comment: Used as hover state for white text

additional-colors.name: dark-gray02
additional-colors.comment: Theoretically used for captions on $very-light-gray background; in actuality overridden by $text-gray

additional-colors.name: on-black-border
additional-colors.comment: Used as divider in journal dropdown
